root.name: Wallace and Gromit's Grand Adventures
root.description: Join Wallace and his dog Gromit in a series episodes of of grand adventures create by Telltale Games, the minds behind the Sam & Max game series and Strong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People. Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures contains four episodes -- Fright of the Bumblebees, The Last Resort, Muzzled! and The Boogeyman.
